question: When is the 'World Day of Social Justice' observed?
explanation:
Every year, the World Day of Social Justice is observed on February 20. The prime objective of this observance is to raise voice against social injustice.
It also aims to bring various international organisations and communities on a single platform to end poverty, gender discrimination, physical discrimination, illiteracy, religious discrimination etc. This year, the theme is "A call for social justice in the Digital Economy."
